CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
  purchase_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  purchase_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL,
  PRIMARY KEY (purchase_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_preferences(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT,
  product_name VARCHAR,
  category VARCHAR,
  price DECIMAL,
  PRIMARY KEY (product_id)
)

### STATEMENT

SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM purchase_history;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
  customer_id INT,
  device_id INT,
  preferred_category VARCHAR,
  PRIMARY KEY (customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
  purchase_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  purchase_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL,
  PRIMARY KEY (purchase_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_preferences(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT,
  product_name VARCHAR,
  category VARCHAR,
  price DECIMAL,
  PRIMARY KEY (product_id)
)

### STATEMENT

SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price = (SELECT MIN(price) FROM products);
